Title: The Sixth Sense
Overview: Following an unexpected tragedy, child psychologist Malcolm Crowe meets a nine year old boy named Cole Sear, who is hiding a dark secret.
Tagline: Not every gift is a blessing.
Keywords: child abuse, sense of guilt, loss of child, confidence, psychology, dying and death, marriage crisis, afterlife, single, paranormal phenomena, cowardliness, child, spiritism
production_companies: Spyglass Entertainment, The Kennedy/Marshall Company, Hollywood Pictures, Barry Mendel Productions
Cast: Bruce Willis, Toni Collette, Olivia Williams
